original_text: In the letter, David told Joab, ‘Put Uriah at the front of all our soldiers, where the battle is most dangerous. Then tell the other soldiers to move back away from him. Then he will be alone and the enemy's soldiers will kill him.’
korean_text: 그 편지에 써서 이르기를 너희가 우리아를 맹렬한 싸움에 앞세워 두고 너희는 뒤로 물러가서 그로 맞아 죽게 하라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: In the letter, David told Joab
Put Uriah at the front of all our soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 모든 군사들의 맨 앞에 우리야를 두어라

sentences.original_text: where the battle is most dangerous
Then tell the other soldiers to move back away from him
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 다른 군사들에게 그에게서 물러나도록 말하라

sentences.original_text: and the enemy's soldiers will kill him
